mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT r.name FROM t_user_roles u,t_role r WHERE u.role_id=r.id AND u.user_id=#{userId}
SELECT DISTINCT per.permission FROM t_permission per WHERE per.id IN (SELECT r.per_id FROM t_role_permission r WHERE EXISTS (SELECT u.role_id FROM t_user_roles u WHERE u.user_id = #{userId}))
SELECT * FROM t_user u WHERE u.id != #{userId} AND u.login_account=#{account}
